Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.rest.AuthController
@Path("/auth") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class AuthController extends Object
Controller for authentication-related operations such as login and registration.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Details

    • login

      @POST @Path("/login") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response login(@QueryParam("email") String email, @QueryParam("password") String password)
      Authenticates a user based on email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - user's email
      password - user's password
      Returns:
      Response containing the User object if successful, or error status

    • registerCustomer

      @POST @Path("/register/customer") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerCustomer(GymCustomer customer)
      Registers a new customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - GymCustomer object containing details
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of registration

    • registerOwner

      @POST @Path("/register/owner") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerOwner(Registration registration)
      Submits a registration request for a new gym owner.
      Parameters:
      registration - Registration object containing details
      Returns:
      Response indicating acceptance of the registration request

    • changePassword

      @POST @Path("/change-password") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response changePassword(@QueryParam("email") String email, @QueryParam("oldPassword") String oldPassword, @QueryParam("newPassword") String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      email - registered email
      oldPassword - current password
      newPassword - new password to set
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of password change
